name: Creamy Cottage Cheese Scrambled Eggs
author: Kitchen Kitty
summary: A nice change from regular scrambled eggs. These eggs come out creamy and soft. Perfect with a slice of tomato and turkey bacon for a delicious and fast low-carb breakfast.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon chopped fresh chives, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat
Pour beaten eggs into the skillet; let cook undisturbed until the bottom of the eggs begin to firm, 1 to 2 minutes
Stir cottage cheese and chives into eggs and season with black pepper
Cook and stir until eggs are nearly set, 3 to 4 minutes more
